Measuring spoons trinket
Type: Material
Value: 108
Fine Value: 496
Keyword: Trinket
Search
Keyword: 		Cooking
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

The measuring spoons trinket shines bright in the light. This would be useful for an amulet some day.

The Measuring spoons trinket item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Measuring spoons trinket is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Create an amulet of measuring spoons Needs Basic Trinketry Bench service or better. Trinketry lvl. 43 1x Measuring spoons trinket
1x Gold bar
1x Silver bar		 1x Amulet of measuring spoon
